text:
Just wanted to drop this here as a reference for folks who may need it or are just starting out at javascript. Wes Bos has released a free Beginner JavaScript text guide today. It’s all based on his BeginnerJavaScript (.com) course and can be used a stand-alone resource or in addition to taking the course.
<https://wesbos.com/javascript/>

On a similar vein to AJ’s - integrating a version control system like git into your development workflow can have a really positive impact on your team.
I recommend checking out the <https://guides.github.com/introduction/git-handbook/|Git Handbook> which teaches what git is, why you want it, and what the basics are.

Once you’ve read that we recommend checking out <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-an-efficient-development-workflow|creating an efficient developer workflow> and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration|continuous integration with GitHub> to get the most out of working with git and HubSpot.
